text: European Seaways Inc. is a Greek shipping company that operates ferry services between Italy, Greece, and formerly Albania. ==Routes== European Seaways operates the following route across the Adriatic Sea:http://www.europeanseaways.com/?page_id=9 *Brindisi - Corfu - Igoumenitsa ==Fleet== European Seaways currently operates the following RORO ferry:http://www.europeanseaways.com/?page_id=5 ===Current Fleet=== {| class="wikitable" | Ship || Flag || Built || Entered service || Gross Tonnage || Length || Breadth || Passengers || Vehicles || Speed|| Notes |- |align="Center" |F/B Galaxy ||align="Center" | ||align="Center" | 1979 ||align="Center" | 2017 ||align="Center" | ||align="Center" |127.6 m ||align="Center" | 19.5 m ||align="Center" |900 ||align="Center" |280 ||align="Center" | 18 (20 max) knots || Brindisi-Vlore route |- |align="Center" |F/B Golden Bridge ||align="Center" | ||align="Center" | 1990 ||align="Center" | 2019 ||align="Center" | ||align="Center" |186.5 m ||align="Center" | 24.8 m ||align="Center" |1.500 ||align="Center" |500 ||align="Center" | 20 (23,2 max) knots || Igoumenitsa-Brindisi route. |- |} ===Out of Service=== {| class="wikitable" | Ship || Flag || Built || Entered service || Gross Tonnage || Length || Breadth || Passengers || Vehicles || Speed|| Notes |- |align="Center" |F/B Prince ||align="Center" | ||align="Center" | 1974 ||align="Center" | 2018 ||align="Center" | ||align="Center" |152.4 m ||align="Center" | 20 m ||align="Center" |1.230 ||align="Center" |300 ||align="Center" | 18 (20 max) knots || Laid Up in Katakolon |- |} === Former ships === {| class="wikitable" !Ship !Years of service |- |F/B European Spirit |1990-1995 |- |F/B European Glory |1990-1991 |- |F/B European Glory |1991-1997 |- |F/B European Star |1992-1994 |- |F/B Pearl William |1993 |- |F/B European Pride |1994-1997 |- |F/B Horizon (it was previously named Dignity and Ionis) |1996-2015 |- |F/B Apollon |2007-2010 |- |F/B Prince |2016 |- |F/B Bridge |2010-2017 |- | colspan="2" | Source: ferry- site.dkEuropean Seaways The ferry site |} ==References== Category:Ferry companies of Greece Category:Companies based in Athens Category:Ferry companies of Italy
title: European Seaways
